title: KSITIL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 04 Assistant Manager and Other Posts
description: The Kerala State Information Technology Infrastructure Limited (KSITIL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 04 Assistant Manager and Deputy Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ B.E./B.Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical Engineering, and MBA can apply for the KSITIL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can ...
